data.title: Animated CD Kirarin Revolution Song Selection Vol. 4 [Regular Edition]
data.meta_description:
[List of songs]
(1) Papancake (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (2) TOKYO FRIEND ☆ SHIPS (SHIPS) (3) アナタボシ (Kirari Ver.) (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (4) アナタボシ (Noeru Ver.) (Yukino Noeru Sayaka Kitahara) (6) San San GOGO (Kirari Ver.) (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (7) San San GOGO (Noeru Ver.) (Yukino Noeru You Kikkawa) (8) San San GOGO (Noeru Ver.) (Hanasaki Noeru You Kikkawa) (9) Papancake (Original Karaoke) (10) TOKYO FRIEND ☆ SHIPS (Original Karaoke)
[Label]
Zetima
[Number of pieces]
1 piece
[CD Audition note comment]
Anime 『 Kirarin Revolution 』's opening and ending collection. The linking unit with real idol such as SHIPS and MilkyWay is good as idol songs. The 1 st, 3 rd and 6 th songs of Kirari are also good as the needle is swinging out as usual.
[CD New Score Comment]
The 4 th song selection of TV Tokyo anime 『 Kirarin Revolution 』. The popular song 「 アナタボシ 」 「 San San GOGO 」 can be enjoyed with each member's solo version.
[Tie-up information]
TV 「 Kirarin Revolution 」 insertion song 「 TOKYO FRIEND ☆ SHIPS 」
TV 「 Kirarin Revolution ending theme 「 papancake 」
アナタボシ 」 Sayaka Kitahara
data.text:
Product description ※Please note that product information is not in full comprehensive meaning because of the machine translation.

[List of songs]

(1) Papancake (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (2) TOKYO FRIEND ☆ SHIPS (SHIPS) (3) アナタボシ (Kirari Ver.) (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (4) アナタボシ (Noeru Ver.) (Yukino Noeru Sayaka Kitahara) (6) San San GOGO (Kirari Ver.) (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (7) San San GOGO (Noeru Ver.) (Yukino Noeru You Kikkawa) (8) San San GOGO (Noeru Ver.) (Hanasaki Noeru You Kikkawa) (9) Papancake (Original Karaoke) (10) TOKYO FRIEND ☆ SHIPS (Original Karaoke)

[Label]

Zetima

[Number of pieces]

1 piece

[CD Audition note comment]

Anime 『 Kirarin Revolution 』's opening and ending collection. The linking unit with real idol such as SHIPS and MilkyWay is good as idol songs. The 1 st, 3 rd and 6 th songs of Kirari are also good as the needle is swinging out as usual.

[CD New Score Comment]

The 4 th song selection of TV Tokyo anime 『 Kirarin Revolution 』. The popular song 「 アナタボシ 」 「 San San GOGO 」 can be enjoyed with each member's solo version.

[Tie-up information]

TV 「 Kirarin Revolution 」 insertion song 「 TOKYO FRIEND ☆ SHIPS 」

TV 「 Kirarin Revolution ending theme 「 papancake 」

アナタボシ 」 Sayaka Kitahara
